job_description:
Data Scientist

Hands-on Data Scientist with strong Python and backend skills to maintain and improve production algorithms. The focus is on performance optimization, parallel processing, bug fixing, and building/maintaining REST APIs (Django/FastAPI).

ML/DL is applied pragmatically; GCP is a plus.

Key Responsibilities

  • Maintain and improve production algorithms; triage and fix bugs; add regression tests
  • Profile and optimize code (CPU/memory/I/O); apply parallelism/concurrency where relevant
  • Design and maintain REST APIs (Django/DRF or FastAPI) for model/algorithm services
  • Test for efficiency and scalability; benchmark latency/throughput; right-size costs
  • Ensure high code quality: unit/integration tests, type hints, CI/CD, documentation
  • Collaborate with product/data/QA to prioritize improvements and meet SLAs

Must-Have Qualifications

  • 6–8 years in data science/software roles with production-grade Python
  • Strong Python expertise (pandas, NumPy), profiling tools (cProfile, line_profiler, memory_profiler, py-spy)
  • Parallel/concurrent processing (multiprocessing, threading, asyncio) and performance tuning
  • REST API development with Django/DRF or FastAPI (auth, error handling, pagination)
  • ML fundamentals with scikit-learn; experience deploying models to services
  • Testing/quality: pytest/unit test, CI/CD, Git workflows; clear communication and documentation
  • Knowledge in scikit-learn, PyTorch or TensorFlow; experiment tracking (MLflow/W&B)
  • GCP (Cloud Run/GKE, BigQuery, GCS), Docker/Kubernetes, Cloud Build/GitHub Actions
  • Observability: OpenTelemetry, GCP Monitoring/Logging; Sentry
  • Security practices: OAuth2/JWT, secrets management, PII handling

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at career@aabasoft.com
summary: Data Scientist needed for algorithm improvement and API development. Requires strong Python, backend, and ML skills with a focus on performance and scalability. Apply at career@aabasoft.com.

job_description:
HR Executive

As an HR Executive, you will shape the first impression of every employee and help build a lively, disciplined, and growth-driven workplace. You are the heartbeat of daily HR operations and the face of employee support at Zapare.

Your Impact

  • Create seamless onboarding experiences that make new hires feel welcomed, valued, and confident.
  • Maintain accurate documentation, HRMS updates, and employee records with precision.
  • Support attendance management, leave processes, and monthly payroll inputs.
  • Coordinate interviews and contribute actively to closing positions with the right talent.
  • Assist in employee engagement programs, culture-building initiatives, and internal events.
  • Provide timely, empathetic responses to employee queries and support their needs.

You Are Someone Who

  • Has 1–3 years of experience in HR or People Operations.
  • Is enthusiastic, detail-oriented, and highly organized.
  • Enjoys working with people and solving day-to-day challenges with positivity.
  • Communicates clearly and handles confidential information responsibly.
  • Is eager to grow into a future HR leader and take on expanded responsibilities over time.

Why This Role Matters

Your work ensures every employee feels supported, heard, and valued. You help keep the organization running smoothly, strengthen its culture, and uplift the employee experience every single day.

For more details, please Visit: www.zaparetech.com/career

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@zaparetech.com
summary: HR Executive to manage daily operations, onboarding, and employee support. Will ensure smooth HR processes and a positive employee experience.

job_description:
HR & Admin Executive

As an HR & Admin Executive, you play a crucial role in ensuring that the company runs smoothly—across people operations, office administration, and workplace experience. Your work directly influences employee satisfaction, operational efficiency, and the overall culture of the organization.

You’re a Great Fit If You

summary: HR & Admin Executive role supporting HR operations and office administration. Responsibilities include onboarding, payroll, vendor coordination, and maintaining a positive workplace. Requires 1-3 years of experience.

job_description:
AR Caller at Zapare Technologies

Zapare Technologies, a leading provider of Revenue Cycle Management solutions and services for the US Healthcare industry, is looking for an experienced AR Caller with hands-on exposure in Medical Billing and Claims, particularly in Behavioural Health and Laboratory Billing. The ideal candidate will have strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and excellent communication abilities.

Job Specification

  • Job Title: AR Caller
  • Experience: 1 – 2 Years
  • Education Qualification: Graduate in any stream

Job Description:

  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English (Mandatory)
  • Good Analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Basic computer knowledge is essential
  • Basic knowledge in MS Office application is essential
  • Good keyboarding skills
  • Ability to handle high call volumes and meet collection targets.
  • Ability to learn and adapt to a fast-paced work culture.
  • Working days: 5 days (Off on Saturday & Sunday)
  • Shift schedule: Night shift only

Required Experience:

We are seeking candidates with at least 1 - 2 years of hands-on experience in Medical Billing RCM denial management with a strong understanding of the following areas:

  • Systematically follow up on aging, underpaid and denied claims with payers to ensure maximum reimbursement for healthcare providers.
  • Verification of patient coverage and benefits for specific dates of service prior to or during claim follow-up.
  • Initiate contact with insurance companies via phone, payer portals, and written correspondence to appeal denials and expedite claim processing.
  • Maintain up-to-date knowledge of insurance policies, coverage, and billing procedures.
  • Maintain and document all calls and its correspondence communications in patient accounting system.
  • Efficiently maneuver through commercial payor portals (e.g., claims search, patient eligibility, documents upload, appeals dashboards).
  • Prioritize claims based on dollar amount, aging status, and payer response timelines.
  • Analyze Explanation of Benefits (EOB) and Electronic Remittance Advice (ERA) to identify reasons for non-payment or underpayment.
  • Escalate unresolved claims to the appropriate department for further action.
  • Identify and correct coding errors, billing discrepancies, or missing documentation that led to the claim issue.
  • Compiling medical records from EHR.
  • Systematic and regular follow up on appeals, to maintain TFL.
  • Ensure compliance with HIPAA regulations and healthcare industry standards.
  • Meet daily and monthly AR collection targets.

For more details, please Visit: www.zaparetech.com/career

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@zaparetech.com
summary: Seeking an AR Caller with 1-2 years of experience in Medical Billing and RCM. Responsibilities include claim follow-up, denial appeals, and meeting collection targets.

job_description:
Search Engine Optimization Specialist

GS-IT, a leading IT company in Dubai, is committed to excellence, offering professional IT support for infrastructure, IT maintenance, AV, cloud services, cyber security, and strategic IT consulting to drive business success.

JOB DESCRIPTION - SEO Specialist

Responsibilities:

  1. Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

    • Plan and execute end-to-end SEO strategies aligned with business goals focused on the IT industry.
    • Perform in-depth keyword research, competitive analysis, and search intent analysis.
    • Implement advanced on-page optimization: semantic keywords, internal linking, content clustering, CTR optimization.
    • Manage and enhance off-page SEO: high-quality link building, digital PR outreach, backlink audits.
    • Conduct regular technical SEO audits and collaborate with developers to resolve issues related to:
      • Crawlability & indexing
      • Site architecture
      • Page speed & Core Web Vitals
      • Schema markup & structured data
    • Oversee local SEO efforts including Google Business Profile and local citations.
    • Track and optimize rankings, organic traffic, and conversions using Google Analytics, Search Console, or similar tools.
    • Identify new growth opportunities through algorithm trends, SERP behavior, and industry insights.
    • Plan and execute emerging AI trends and integrate AI-driven insights into SEO strategies and adapting to algorithm changes.

  2. Content Strategy & Optimization

    • Support and guide the content team with SEO-driven content briefs, keyword mapping, and topical authority planning.
    • Optimize content for user intent, featured snippets, voice search, and rich results.
    • Review and update existing content to improve ranking potential and user engagement.
    • Ensure all content meets SEO best practices, readability standards, and brand guidelines.

  3. Performance Monitoring & Reporting

    • Set up SEO dashboards and reporting frameworks for ongoing performance analysis.
    • Prepare monthly SEO reports with insights, outcomes, and strategic recommendations.
    • Analyze conversion paths, landing page performance, and behavioral metrics to improve UX and retention.
    • Provide actionable suggestions to improve website visibility, structure, and search performance.

  4. Collaboration & Digital Marketing Support

    • Support in coordination with design, content, and development teams to ensure SEO integration across all digital assets.
    • Support broader digital marketing activities, including campaign optimization and landing page improvements.
    • Ensure alignment of SEO roadmap with overall digital marketing goals.
    • Support digital marketing team in inquiry management via chats, calls, or email.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, IT, Computer Science, Business, or related fields.
  • 2–3 years proven experience in SEO with measurable results.
  • Solid understanding of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and on-page/off-page strategies.
  • Good knowledge of HTML, CSS basics, CMS platforms, and website architecture.
  • Experience using Google Search Console, Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs, Screaming Frog, etc.
  • Familiarity with Core Web Vitals, schema markup, and other technical SEO enhancements.
  • Understanding of AI trends and AI-driven insights in SEO.
  • Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and convert insights into strategy.
  • Excellent communication, documentation, and project management skills.

How to Apply:

Please send your updated CV to talenthunt@globalsurf.ae with the subject line: “Application for SEO Specialist – GS IT”.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at talenthunt@globalsurf.ae
summary: Seeking an SEO Specialist with 2-3 years of experience to plan and execute SEO strategies, optimize content, and analyze performance. Must have strong analytical and technical SEO skills.

  • Edit and proofread all content meticulously to uphold superior quality standards, focusing on clarity, reader engagement, and SEO optimization.

  • Exceptional writing, editing, and proofreading abilities with a keen eye for detail.

  • Strong organizational and time-management skills, ensuring timely delivery of projects.

company: KL Koncepts Lab Media and IT Park
job_description:
Marketing Strategy & Research Internship

Duration: 3 Months Mode: Work from Home (Remote) Stipend: Unpaid (Certificate & Experience Provided)

About the Role

We are offering a 3-month virtual internship in Marketing Strategy & Research for enthusiastic students and fresh graduates. This is an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience in market research, strategy development, and data-driven marketing, while working directly with experienced professionals.

Key Responsibilities

  • Conduct secondary market research on industries, competitors, and customer segments.
  • Assist in developing marketing strategy frameworks for different services.
  • Work on customer persona creation, segmentation, and positioning exercises.
  • Support in preparing case studies, proposals, and pitch decks.
  • Track and analyze campaign results to prepare insightful reports.
  • Participate in brainstorming sessions with the strategy and creative team.

Learning Outcomes

  • Exposure to real-world marketing strategy development.
  • Practical experience in market research and competitor analysis.
  • Skills in strategy formulation, reporting, and presentations.
  • Direct mentorship and feedback from the leadership team.
  • Certificate of Completion & LinkedIn Endorsements (on successful completion).

Requirements

  • Currently pursuing or recently completed Bachelor’s/Master’s in Business, Marketing, or related field.
  • Strong interest in marketing strategy, branding, and research.
  • Good analytical skills with proficiency in MS Excel/Google Sheets & PowerPoint/Google Slides.
  • Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and disciplined to work in a remote environment.

Duration & Commitment

  • 3 Months (Work From Home)
  • Flexible working hours (minimum weekly commitment expected: 15–20 hours).

Perks

  • Internship Certificate
  • Work-from-home flexibility
  • Exposure to live projects & strategic assignments
  • Opportunity to publish co-authored blogs/case studies with the team
  • Recommendation/LinkedIn endorsement (based on performance)

Apply Now

job_description:
.NET Project Lead (Contract Based)

We are seeking an experienced .NET Project Lead for a contract-based role. This position involves overseeing project execution, guiding development teams, and managing client interactions. The ideal candidate will possess strong technical expertise, excellent communication skills, and proven end-to-end project management capabilities.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead and mentor a .NET development team, overseeing project workflows.
  • Manage client interactions, including requirement gathering, clarifications, demos, and status updates.
  • Translate client expectations into clear technical tasks for the development team.
  • Design and develop applications utilizing .NET / .NET Core.
  • Develop and optimize Web APIs and ensure seamless integration with front-end applications.
  • Conduct code reviews, enforcing coding standards and best practices.
  • Collaborate effectively with QA, UI/UX, and product teams throughout the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
  • Troubleshoot complex technical issues and ensure timely resolution.
  • Work with MSSQL/MySQL, writing efficient and optimized queries.
  • Prepare clear technical documentation and project reports.

Requirements:

  • 4+ years of experience working with C#, .NET Framework / .NET Core.
  • Proven experience leading small teams or development modules.
  • Strong knowledge of Web API development and Entity Framework.
  • Excellent communication and client-handling skills.
  • Strong understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), design patterns, and clean coding principles.
  • Ability to manage timelines, priorities, and ensure delivery quality.
  • Knowledge of Angular is considered an added advantage.
  • Experience in contract-based or fast-paced project environments is a plus.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at career@lucidplus.com.

job_description:
Social Media Executive

About the Role:

We are looking for a creative and results-driven Social Media Executive with 2–3 years of experience to manage and enhance our online presence. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating engaging content, executing social media strategies, and driving brand awareness across various digital platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Handling Social media accounts and client coordination.
  • Plan, create, and publish engaging content across social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, X (Twitter), and YouTube.
  • Monitor social media trends, insights, and competitor activities to enhance content strategy.
  • Create monthly and quarterly content calendars and campaign roadmaps.
  • Manage daily posting schedules using social media tools (e.g., Buffer, Hootsuite, Meta Business Suite).
  • Collaborate with creative team and campaign team along with designers, writers, and video editors to produce engaging content. Ensure all content reflects brand tone, voice, and visual identity.
  • Develop and run paid social media campaigns to increase reach and engagement.
  • Track performance metrics, generate monthly reports, and suggest improvements.
  • Respond to comments, queries, and messages across platforms promptly.
  • Support influencer collaborations and social media partnerships.
  • Maintain brand consistency in tone, style, and messaging.
  • Contribute ideas for new content formats, contest and campaign strategies.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communication, or a related field.
  • 2–3 years of hands-on experience in social media management.
  • Strong understanding of social media algorithms, trends, and analytics.
  • Proficiency in tools such as social media schedulers.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

  • Experience with TypeScript, JavaScript ES6+, and mobile architecture patterns (MVVM, Redux, etc.).

Contact:

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@planetmedia.in
summary: Seeking an experienced React Native Developer with 2+ years experience. Responsibilities include building high-performance mobile apps and collaborating with teams. Knowledge of Flutter is required.

job_description:
AI Developer

About the Job

As a specialist in electronics and software for the past 20 years, in-tech is a dynamic, fast-growing engineering company headquartered in Munich, Germany, employing around 2350 employees globally across 20 project locations in 8 countries. in-tech develops innovative engineering solutions for the automotive, rail, aerospace, defence, and industrial sectors.

We are committed to a flexible, modern work culture and work-life balance. Our colour orange stands for liveliness, warmth, and dynamism. We value a strong team spirit, fresh ideas, and a positive work culture. We call it the “Orange Spirit”!

Since 2024, in-tech became a subsidiary of Infosys Ltd. This strategic partnership enables us to offer our customers even more comprehensive development and digitalization services and a greater offshore capability. We are looking for an experienced AI Developer to join our team based out of our Kochi location with hybrid work options, to lead the design, development, and deployment of cutting-edge AI, Generative AI, and Agentic-AI solutions for enterprise customers. If you’re passionate about joining a growing and dynamic team with a company with a positive culture and team spirit, we’d love to connect with you!

Responsibilities

  1. Design, plan, and implement AI, Generative AI, and Agentic-AI architectures for customer projects.
  2. Develop custom end-to-end GenAI and LLM-based solutions, using frameworks such as LangChain, LangGraph, AutoGen, HuggingFace, and OpenAI APIs.
  3. Implement and operate machine learning systems using TensorFlow, PyTorch, and modern LLM/ML tooling.
  4. Build and manage cloud-based AI ecosystems on AWS, Azure, or GCP, including architecture design and platform operations.
  5. Apply DevOps/MLOps and LLMOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), and model deployment workflows.
  6. Collaborate closely with enterprise architects, engineering teams, and C-level stakeholders to align AI roadmaps and solution strategies.
  7. Evaluate and introduce new AI technologies, frameworks, and agentic tools to expand the organization’s (Gen)AI capabilities.
  8. Lead the technical execution of proof-of-concepts (PoCs) in an agile environment.
  9. Provide strategic consulting on cloud-native, scalable, and secure AI platform architectures.

Requirements

  1. Degree in (Business) Computer Science, Engineering, or a comparable technical field.
  2. 5+ years of experience as a Solutions Architect or Enterprise Architect in cloud/data environments.
  3. Proven experience developing and integrating LLM or Generative AI solutions into production systems.
  4. Hands-on project experience designing complex cloud architectures on AWS, Azure, or GCP.
  5. Strong knowledge of AI/ML development with Python and major ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, HuggingFace).
  6. Practical experience with agentic AI frameworks (e.g., LangGraph, AutoGen) and LLM orchestration tools.
  7. Experience with MLOps, DevOps, and container technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes; familiarity with CI/CD for ML models.
  8. Understanding of architecture frameworks and agile methods (Scrum, Kanban).
  9. Excellent English communication skills.
  10. Willingness to travel, depending on project requirements.

Apply with us

If you have experience and team spirit and are looking for a great place to work, then start your job with us.

As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, in-tech is committed to equal employment opportunity without regard for age, race, colour, national origin, ethnicity, gender, protected veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.

Contact:

  • Website: https://in-tech.com/en/carrers/jobs/ai-developer-1881
  • Email: india.talent@in-tech.com
summary: Experienced AI Developer sought for designing and deploying AI, GenAI, and Agentic-AI solutions. Requires 5+ years in cloud/data architecture with strong Python and ML framework experience.

job_description:
Academic Associate (Operations)

We are seeking a dynamic and enthusiastic individual with strong command of the English language and the ability to handle international clients to join our team as an Academic Associate.

Job Description:

  • Strong problem solving and client interaction skills, and ability to work in a result-oriented team environment.
  • Maintains relationships with clients by providing support, information, and guidance, researching, and recommending new opportunities.
  • Identifies business opportunities by identifying prospects. Researching and analyzing sales options.
  • Prepares reports by collecting, analysing, and summarizing information.
  • Maintains quality service by establishing and enforcing organization standards.
  • Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
  • Communicating with clients or employers about project, event or campaign expectations and goals.
  • Answer telephones and respond to inquiries from clients and participants.
  • Create, compile and export databases containing all information for each event.
  • Deal with customer complaints or issues.
  • Supporting other teams with various administrative tasks (redirecting calls, disseminating correspondence, scheduling meetings etc.).
  • Being an active member in supporting the collective well-being of the organization and team, to provide quality educational service worldwide.

Requirements & Other Details:

  • Graduate/Post Graduate.
  • Experience: 0 to 1 year experience in customer handling.
  • Strong written & oral communication skills in English.
  • Organized with the ability to prioritize and multi-task.
  • Reliable with patience and professionalism.
  • Willing to work in Shifts.
  • Job location: Infopark Cochin Phase-I

About Us:

TutorComp is an online tutoring global leader providing personalized tutors all over the world. We enable students across the World to learn, excel and stay ahead of the knowledge and innovation curve. Our exceedingly qualified and expert tutors enable students to outperform and deliver outstanding grades. Our mission is to make learning easily accessible to students, and to leverage technology and global talent. Our global operations are supported through an extensive network at various worldwide markets of United States, United Kingdom, Hong Kong, Singapore, Australia, France, India, UAE (Abu Dhabi, Ajman, Dubai, and Sharjah), Kuwait, Bahrain, Qatar, Saudi Arabia and Malaysia.

Contact Information: Interested candidates can apply by sharing their resume to hr@tutorcomp.com
summary: Seeking an Academic Associate for operations. This role involves client interaction, administrative tasks, and problem-solving for a global online tutoring leader. Freshers with strong English skills preferred.

job_description:
Backend Engineer

About Us

Testing Mavens is a next-generation QA & Software Testing Services provider headquartered in New Jersey, USA, with offshore facilities in India. We have deep expertise in various spheres like Finance and Advisory, EdTech, Fashion and Pharmacy, etc. We partner with massive global brands to deliver an excellent testing experience.

Job Title: Backend Engineer Location: Remote Type: Full-time Availability: Immediate Joiners Only

About the Role

We are looking for a skilled and motivated Backend Engineer to join our team. In this role, you’ll play a key part in designing, building, and maintaining scalable backend systems and APIs that power our applications. You should have strong experience with Python, Node.js, and cloud infrastructure on AWS. This is a backend-focused role — though exposure to full stack environments is welcome, we’re primarily looking for someone who thrives in building robust backend systems.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and maintain backend services, APIs, and microservices.
  • Write clean, scalable, and well-documented code in Python and Node.js.
  • Integrate and manage cloud-based infrastructure using AWS services (e.g., EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS, API Gateway).
  • Collaborate with frontend engineers, product managers, and QA to deliver high-quality features.
  • Optimize applications for speed, scalability, and reliability.
  • Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines.
  • Monitor and troubleshoot production systems as needed.

Requirements

  • 3+ years of backend development experience.
  • Proficiency in Python and Node.js.
  • Strong understanding of RESTful API design and microservices architecture.
  • Hands-on experience with AWS services (e.g., Lambda, S3, EC2, RDS, CloudWatch).
  • Experience with databases: SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL (DynamoDB, MongoDB).
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).
  • Understanding of security, authentication, and authorization in APIs.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Nice to Have

  • Experience with Docker and container orchestration tools (e.g., ECS, Kubernetes).
  • Exposure to serverless architecture.
  • Familiarity with logging/monitoring tools (e.g., ELK, CloudWatch, Datadog).
  • Basic understanding of frontend frameworks like React or Next.js.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hire@testingmavens.com
summary: Seeking a Backend Engineer to design and build scalable backend systems and APIs. Requires Python, Node.js, and AWS experience for a remote, full-time role.
